posts.post_content:
Just picked up a nice example this week so thought I would throw a feeler to see if anyone else has any vintage Crawford PC's available for sale.  

Thanks!
Thought I would drum this one up from a long time ago....still looking for Sam Crawford Postcards. Please let me know what you might have.
Topping, PC 796 and Novelty Cutlery all on eBay right now, perhaps the seller will work with you on prices.
